detail_desc: Sports shorts in sturdy jersey with taped details, an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and ventilating mesh at the crotch.
Sports joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, taped details and side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for extra mobility and wide ribbed hems.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with a rounded collar, press-studs at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and a double-layered lace skirt.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.

Jacket in a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a stand-up collar. Concealed press-studs and a zip down the front, a yoke at the back, front pockets and two inner pockets. Long sleeves with an adjustable concealed press-stud fastening at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, low dropped shoulders, ribbed cuffs and a drawstring hem. Soft brushed inside.
Round imitation leather purse with a zip fastening and cotton twill lining. Size 3x9 cm.
Shirt in a soft cotton piqué with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
Beret in a felted wool blend with a faux fur pompom on top.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy and covered elastication at the hems.
Loafers in imitation leather with a metal chain and fringes at the front. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and smooth soles.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with wide, adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.

Short sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, mesh key pocket in the waistband and short slits at the hems. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Short dress in softly draping satin with a sheen. V-neck, a wrapover front with narrow ties, short, wide puff sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Tights in soft microfibre with an elasticated waist.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Set with six earrings and an ear cuff in metal decorated with glass rhinestones. The zinc content of the set is recycled.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Crushed velvet ankle boots with pointed toes and a soft shaft. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 9.5 cm.
Fully lined swimsuit with appliqués on the front, narrow shoulder straps and a frill at the top of the legs.

Wide, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a V-shaped opening and wide ties at the neckline. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.
Jersey top in a soft silk and cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps.
Fitted T-shirt in soft pima cotton with a round, ribbed neckline, short, wide sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Unlined.

Blouse in soft lace made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1.1 cm to 2 cm.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

prod_name: LS Blue moon LS SL set (W)
detail_desc: LOVE STORIES x H&M. Satin pyjamas. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, yoke at the back, chest pocket with embroidered text, and buttoned cuffs. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined printed bikini. Triangle top with a decorative ring at the front, adjustable ties at the neck and a plastic fastener at the back. Bottoms with decorative rings at the sides.

Fully lined 5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist. Braided jersey belt with a metal buckle, zip fly and press-stud, and tapered legs. Patterned jersey lining.
Gently fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with peak lapels, a French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Trousers in a cool linen and cotton weave. Regular, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, a zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.

Small handbag in sturdy grained imitation leather with a detachable shoulder strap, two handles, studs on the base and a tab decorated with a chunky metal chain that clips into a fastener on one long side. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Unlined. Size 10x22.5x32 cm.
Top in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with elastication at the top, short sleeves with ties, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved hoodie in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Small, sturdy handbag in imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top and a detachable metal chain shoulder strap. One inner compartment. Lined. Size 9x13x17.5 cm.
Leather sandals with a foot strap decorated with flat, round, metal appliqués. Adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles.
Pencil case in patterned, shimmering metallic imitation leather with a zip at the top. Lined. Size 5x6x20 cm.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Straight-style shirt in a linen weave with a turn-down collar, French front, open chest pocket and gently tapered waist. Yoke at the back, short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Body in jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short puff sleeves with gathered seams, and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.
Two-strand necklace with a chunky metal chain, pearly plastic beads and a heart-shaped pendant. Adjustable length. Trigger clasp.
Long skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short underskirt.
Short, fitted jersey dress with a V-neck, decorative knot detail at the bust and long sleeves.

Checked shirt in soft cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Two flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a cotton weave containing some linen. V-neck, seam with a drawstring at the waist, and a slit at the front. Unlined.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Soft, cable-knit slippers with a decorative bow and pompoms at the front. Faux fur linings and insoles. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.

Fancy dress all-in-one suit in soft velour with a detachable, printed hood with padded ears. Zip with a bow at the front, soft tail at the back, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in sturdy jersey with balloon sleeves made of poplin. Visible seams, raw edges, wide elastication at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Slippers in supersoft faux fur with a fabric toe strap and patterned soles.

Suede biker jacket with notch lapels with press-studs, and a diagonal zip down the front. Two zipped side pockets, one flap front pocket with a press-stud and one zipped front pocket. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs and a sewn-on, adjustable belt with a metal fastener at the hem. Lined.
Short dress in crinkled chiffon with lace details. V-neck with lacing at the back, long sleeves with ties at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and concealed zip in the side. Partly lined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered detail on the front and an adjustable strap with a metal fastening at the back.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a sewn-in wrapover at the front, covered elastication at the waist and overlocked edges. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Set of eight pairs of earrings in various designs. Five pairs of studs, two of which are in the shape of butterflies. Three pairs with pendants, one with metal discs, one with feathers and one with sparkly stones.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Boxy-style top in patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a rib-trimmed neckline and sleeves with jersey-lined, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Short, double-breasted coat in a soft weave with notch lapels and front pockets. Lined.

Long, padded parka in cotton twill with a stand-up collar with press-studs, and a lined, padded hood with a foldover edge. Zip and button band with concealed press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets, flap side pockets with a press stud, and a drawstring at the waist. Concealed inner ribbing at the cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit premium cotton with ribbing around the neckline.
Round sunglasses with twisted metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Cycling shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
